title: St. Patrick's Day
description:
Go green at The Padre Hotel this St. Patrick's Day as we celebrate this holiday the Irish way!

Sham-ROCK DJ at the Prairie Fire from 12pm-6pm

GET LUCKY Slane Whiskey & festive food specials all day

Breakfast Specials

Santa Carota Corn Beef Benedict

Slow braised corn beef, Irish cheddar biscuit, green goddess hollandaise sauce, 16

Green Eggs and Ham

Basil pesto eggs, Irish cheddar, Irish whisky glazed ham 14

Lunch Specials

Prime Beef Shepards Pie

Fresh ground prime beef, carrots, english peas, whipped yukon gold potato, Guinness gravy 18

Santa Carota Corn Beef Ruben

House pickled corn beef, caraway sauerkraut, fontina, thousand island 16

Guinness Brownie al a Mode 8

Dinner Specials

St Patrick’s Holiday Plate 

Slow braised corn beef, braised cabbage, pickled red bliss potatoes, au jus, grain mustard 26
